_comment: SearXNG is available at http://localhost:8080 after deploying searxng-k8s.yaml. It provides a REST API (not MCP protocol) accessible via /search?q=<query>&format=json and /config endpoints. To use SearXNG with MCP, create a custom MCP server that wraps the SearXNG API, or use the built-in 'http' server to make requests to it.
